00044 {

00049 public:
00050         // Wrappers portable across Qt 3.x and Qt 4.x
00051         bool openForReading();
00052         bool openForWriting(bool bAppend = false);
00053 
00054 
00055         // Missing functions in Qt 4.x
00056         qint64 writeBlock(const char * data,quint64 uLen){ return write(data,uLen); };
00057         qint64 readBlock(char * data,quint64 uLen){ return read(data,uLen); };
00058 
00059         // This stuff loads and saves LITTLE ENDIAN DATA!

00061         bool load(kvi_u64_t &t);
00062

00065
